name: Chess President
description:
Chess President
A duel between darkness and light!
White piece: Refers to the power of the bright world - justice.
Black piece: Refers to the power of the dark world - authority.
Game origin: time - 21st century, place - east, Dominate the world.
piece Relations: Society - Moral, Economic - Legal, City{Country} - Power.Justice.
Board borders: black and white, inside and outside.
Children grow up: heroes - angels, demons - monsters.
Out of bounds prohibited: Society-Economy-City, Morality-Law-Power-Justice.
Don't eat piece: Morality-law-power-justice {can't eat directly}.
victory or defeat: Country has crashed {city}.

Features:
-- Upgrade the chess game.
-- 3 difficulty levels.
-- Great soundtrack.
-- 2 Teams.
-- Everything you need in a chess game.
-- New ideas for board games.
-- Timer control game time.
-- You can play against AI or yourself.

victory or defeat：
-- kill city pawns.
